name: @atmtfy/elite
description: Elite Shopify 2.0 Theme. Based on Shopify's "Dawn", but with preprocessing, etc
author: Automatify

scripts.start: pnpm  build && cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && cd ../ && run-p watch serve
scripts.dev:new: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && cd ../ && run-p watch serve
scripts.deploy: pnpm webpack -env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push
scripts.pull: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme pull
scripts.pull:dev: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme pull -d
scripts.push: pnpm webpack --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --unpublished
scripts.push:dry: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme push --unpublished
scripts.update: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push
scripts.update:debug: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push
scripts.update:dry:templates: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme push
scripts.publish: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --publish
scripts.merge: pnpm merge:pre && pnpm run build && pnpm merge:post
scripts.merge:pre: mkdir tmp && cd dist && cp -r templates ../tmp/templates && cp config/settings_data.json ../tmp
scripts.merge:post: cd dist && rm -rf templates && rm -rf config/settings_data.json && mv  ../tmp/templates ./ && mv ../tmp/settings_data.json ./config && rm -rf ../tmp
